channel.title: AI on Krishna Kumar T
channel.description: Recent content in AI on Krishna Kumar T

item.title: The verge of suggestions/recommendations engines
item.description: I have come early from office today and would be watching my next new series from my recommendation list. I hope I would definitely like it as it is based on my behavioral patterns from my earlier watches. I thought of buying a new home for me. I would visit a real estate site that runs on machine learning and gives you recommendations based on your web history or your search preferences.
